name: Frost (itch) (katesmith)
description:
This game is probably the only one of its kind. I made it using exclusively Microsoft PowerPoint's animation system, using hyperlinked objects for player interaction. It's more of a linked visual novel than a "game" per se, but it's quite unique and I think interesting in that regard. I used to make games in PowerPoint like this when I was little, so I made this one last year in the style of those games I used to make.

There are 6 different endings, and each give you a different poem or excerpt of a poem by Robert Frost.
